products.title: RedMagic 5s (8GB RAM + 128GB Memory)
products.description: RedMagic 5s (8GB RAM + 128GB Memory) Product Description RedMagic 5s, the latest flagship smartphone from Nubia, is now available. The phone packs a powerful punch with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 5G processor, a 6.65-inch AMOLED display, and four rear cameras (64MP + 8MP + 2MP). It also has a 4500mAh battery and runs on the Android 10 operating system. Whether you’re a casual user or a power user, the RedMagic 5s is sure to please. products.title: Infinix X6532C Smart 9 HD
products.description: Appreciating the bigger world Infinix Smart 9 reveals a design inspired by nature in the 6.7″ Waterdrop display. The beautiful, vibrant screen, it’s a cinema-quality experience in a slender frame that fits snugly in your grip. Shows off a bigger world for your entertainment or playing needs. AWESOME 50MP CAMERA, CAPTURE EVERY DETAIL Snap unforgettable moments in vibrant detail with the 50MP Main Camera. products.title: Green Lion Kids Smart Phone 2.8″
products.description: Introducing Green Lion Children’s Smart Phone 2.8 inch. With a colorful 2.8″ IPS screen and a 240*320 resolution, it offers sharp graphics for an engaging viewing experience. Children may use devices for longer periods of time without having to frequently recharge them thanks to a 600mAh battery. The 13 pre-installed games provide hours of pleasure and education, and the built-in camera enables kids to capture pictures and movies with a flashlight option, this lightweight gadget is ideal for kids to discover and enjoy because of its user-friendly interface and sturdy design

products.title: Nokia 105 Dual
products.description: Nokia phones are well known for their exceptional build quality. With soft curves that feel good in your hand and a cover that keeps its color if scratched, the new Nokia 105 Dual SIM is beautifully crafted and built to last. A clear improvement With better call clarity and audio that’s 20% louder than the previous version, the Nokia 105 Dual SIM gives you excellent call quality in noisy environments. And with space for 2000 contacts and up to 15 hours of talk time, you have everything you need to get the most out of your mobile calling experience. Entertainment
